text: Awesome! Hello everyone! :slightly_smiling_face: Maybe we could schedule in a meeting, get to know each other, specialties, stuff we're working on, best ways to communicate... etc. Build up a little freelance community.
I think setting up a directory/network of freelancers/independent contractors that work with HubSpot would be cool so I'm going to try it and see if there's any interest
I've created this link if it's something you'd be interested in: <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/get-on-the-independent-freelance-HubSpot-directory>

I've posted this on the thread above as well.

I'm thinking of building a directory of HubSpot freelancers/independent contractors (similar to the Agency directory but specifically for non-agencies) and will do so if there's any interest. I created a landing page (below) if you're interested in being added.

I think it could also be nice to build a little network and maybe set up a way to keep in touch. Freelance life can be solitary at the best of times and more so in these crazy times!

<https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/get-on-the-independent-freelance-HubSpot-directory>
